short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide specific elements on YouTube pages for a cleaner viewing experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
YouTube Element Hider

Version: 1.2.0

Description:
Tired of cluttered YouTube pages? With YouTube Element Hider, take control of your viewing experience by toggling the visibility of specific elements on YouTube pages. Whether it's annoying sidebar suggestions, distracting comments, or any other element you'd rather do without, this extension empowers you to customize your YouTube environment according to your preferences. Enjoy a cleaner, more focused browsing experience on the world's largest video platform.

Permissions Required:

Active Tab Access
Scripting Permission
Storage Permission
